Name: Disney
Description: The Walt Disney Company, commonly known as Disney, is an American multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate
Reason: Disney made an official announcement that it will be pledging $2m and further initiatives to support Israel. Whilst the CEO explicitly condemned attacks on Jews in Israel, he made no mention of the Palestinian people who are being killed by the Israeli military.
How to Boycott: Don't work for Disney. Don't subscribe to Disney+. Cancel Disney+ if you have it. Don't watch Disney movies. Don't visit Disney theme parks. Don't buy Disney merchandise. Don't watch Disney TV shows.
